FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: ※ 아이콘 이미지는 '추적 설정 > 주문별 상세설정 > 아이콘 변경' 메뉴에서 변경 가능합니다.

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: ※ 바 텍스처와 색상은 'UI 설정 > 바' 메뉴에서 변경 가능합니다.

Scripts.OnClick: self:GetParent():Hide() if self:GetParent().cancelFunc then if type(self:GetParent().arg) == "table" then self:GetParent().cancelFunc(self:GetParent(), unpack(self:GetParent().arg)); else self:GetParent().cancelFunc(self:GetParent(), self:GetParent().arg); end end

self:GetParent():Hide() if self:GetParent().cancelFunc then if type(self:GetParent().arg) == "table" then self:GetParent().cancelFunc(self:GetParent(), unpack(self:GetParent().arg)); else self:GetParent().cancelFunc(self:GetParent(), self:GetParent().arg); end end

self:GetParent():Hide() if self:GetParent().func then if type(self:GetParent().arg) == "table" then self:GetParent().func(self:GetParent(), unpack(self:GetParent().arg)); else self:GetParent().func(self:GetParent(), self:GetParent().arg); end end

Scripts.OnTextSet: local value = HDH_AT_UTIL.Trim(self:GetText()) or "" if string.len(value) > 0 then self.Desc:Hide() else self:SetText("") self.Desc:Show() end
Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: local value = HDH_AT_UTIL.Trim(self:GetText()) or "" if string.len(value) > 0 then self.Desc:Hide() else self:SetText("") self.Desc:Show() end

Scripts.OnTextSet: local value = HDH_AT_UTIL.Trim(self:GetText()) or "" if string.len(value) > 0 then self.Desc:Hide() else self:SetText("") self.Desc:Show() end
Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: local value = HDH_AT_UTIL.Trim(self:GetText()) or "" if string.len(value) > 0 then self.Desc:Hide() else self:SetText("") self.Desc:Show() end

Scripts.OnLoad: self.always_show_list = true self.Text:Hide() self.List:Show() self.List:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self, "TOPLEFT", 0, 0) self.List.BG:Hide()

Scripts.OnEnterPressed: local r, g, b, a = HDH_AT_UTIL.StringToColor(self:GetText()) if r ~= nil then if not self:GetParent().enableAlpha then a = nil end self:GetParent():SetColorRGBA(r, g, b, a) if self:GetParent().handler then self:GetParent().handler(self:GetParent(), r, g, b, a) end else if self:GetParent().errorHandler then self:GetParent().errorHandler(self:GetParent(), self:GetText()) end r, g, b, a = unpack(self:GetParent().rgba) self:GetParent():SetColorRGBA(r, g, b, a) end self:ClearFocus()
Scripts.OnEscapePressed: local r, g, b, a = unpack(self:GetParent().rgba) self:GetParent():SetColorRGBA(r, g, b, a) self:ClearFocus()

Scripts.OnMouseUp: self:GetParent():SetScript("OnUpdate", nil) self:StopMovingOrSizing() self:ClearAllPoints() self:SetPoint("CENTER", self:GetParent().Bar, "RIGHT", 0, 0)

if not self:GetParent().EditBox:HasFocus() then self:GetParent().BtnCancel:Hide() self:GetParent().CBIsItem:Hide() self:GetParent().EditBox:Hide() self:GetParent().Name:Show() self:GetParent().Background:Show() end self:GetParent():LoadBackup()

Scripts.OnEditFocusLost:
local curValue = HDH_AT_UTIL.Trim(self:GetText()) or "" if HDH_AT_UTIL.Trim(self.initText) ~= curValue and not self.searchedValue then self:GetParent():SetName(self:GetParent():GetValue()) self:GetParent():SetDefaultIcon() end
if self.cmdPressed or (not self:GetParent().BtnCancel.overMouse and not self:GetParent().CBIsItem.overMouse) then self:GetParent().CBIsItem:Hide() self:GetParent().BtnCancel:Hide() self:Hide() self:GetParent().Name:Show() self:GetParent().Background:Show() if string.len(curValue) == 0 then self:GetParent().Desc:Show() else self:GetParent().Desc:Hide() end end
self.searchedValue = nil self.initText = nil self.cmdPressed = false
Scripts.OnEnterPressed: if self:GetParent().OnClickSearchHandler then self.searchedValue = self:GetParent().OnClickSearchHandler(self:GetParent()) end self.cmdPressed = true self:ClearFocus()

Scripts.OnMouseUp: self.Name:Hide() self.Background:Hide() self.EditBox:Show() self.EditBox:SetFocus() self.CBIsItem:Show() self.BtnCancel:Show()

Scripts.OnLeave: self.on_cursor = false if not self.Dragging then self.Background:Hide() end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: self.Dragging = false if not self.on_cursor then self.Background:Hide() end
